original_text: Joab saw that there were two groups of the enemy's soldiers. They were ready to attack his army from different sides. So he chose some of Israel's best soldiers. Joab himself led them to attack the Syrian soldiers in the fields.
korean_text: 요압이 자기와 맞서 앞뒤에 친 적진을 보고 이스라엘의 선발한 자 중에서 또 엄선하여 아람 사람과 싸우려고 진 치고

sentences.original_text: Joab saw that there were two groups
sentences.korean_translation: 요압은 두 그룹이 있는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: They were ready to attack his army
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 군대를 공격할 준비가 되어 있었다

sentences.original_text: So he chose some of Israel's best soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 이스라엘 최고의 군사들을 일부 선택했다
